snippet: Critics call the detention of five people from the publication, over an article about a proposal to allow strict Islamic law, an assault on press freedom.
abstract: Malaysian police arrest three editors and two executives of news website The Malaysian Insider after reporting that sultans rejected a proposal for strict enforcement of Islamic law.
lead_paragraph: Critics call the detention of five people from the publication, over an article about a proposal to allow strict Islamic law, an assault on press freedom.

headline.main: Editors and Executives of News Website Malaysian Insider Are Arrested
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Malaysia: News Site’s Editors and Executives Arrested
